About me

I'm a junior Front-End developer originally from Serbia üá∑üá∏ , currently based in Munich Germany üá©üá™ . I like to create things that live on the internet and I enjoy the whole path that lead me to the final goal. My interest in web development started in 2019, I teached myself through Youtube tutorials, Udemy courses, and in year 2020 I decided to enroll into school (in Germany) to be a web developer. In February I graduate the IHK school and currently I'm looking for my first Job.
In my free time I like DIY, playing guitar üé∏ and building my own projects.
